options.negatives: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad anatomy), extra digit, fewer digits, (extra arms:1.2), bad hands, by (bad-artist:0.6), bad-image-v2-39000, NSFW, nipples, loli, child, children, shota, boy, male, men, man,
options.prompts: detailed background, masterpiece, best quality, 1girl, laser, orb, energy orb, funny hat

comments.log_file_cnt: Number of logfiles to cycle through.  e.g. you could have 5 files each 32 MB.
comments.managers: How many job mangers to spawn.  Each manager oversees an independent job queue.
comments.max_bytes: Maximum size of a logfile, measured in Bytes.

options.banned_words: Words to prevent in the prompt field.  Is an aggressive filter (e.g. cumulus is banned in the default set)
options.banned_neg_words: Words to prevent in the negative prompt field.  Is an aggressive filter (e.g. adulterated is banned in the default set)
options.height: Default image height.  SD usually expects images greater than 255 pixels.
options.max_prompt_len: Number of characters to allow for user input, both for positive and negative prompts.
options.sampler: Default noise sampler, greatly influences image output.
options.step_size: Specifies width and height increments. (e.g. default settings require width/heights in increments of 64 pixels).
options.width: Default image width.  SD usually expects images greater than 255 pixels.

db_opts.password: Password to log-in as the MariaDB user.  Added here (insecurly) since the DB shouldn't be externally accessable.

queue_opts.fn_dict_path: Path to a newline-separated list of first names to use in the generator.
queue_opts.ln_dict_path: Path to a newline-separated list of last names to use in the generator.

queue_opts.depth: How many jobs can be in the queue.
queue_opts.job_cooldown: How many seconds to delay before starting another job (in case your computer catches fire).
queue_opts.job_count: How many job tasks to spawn.  Each job gets a single queue object to send to the SD engine.
queue_opts.max_guilds: Max guilds to serve at a time, if you want to limit that.
queue_opts.max_guild_reqs: How many requests can be submitted by a single guild.  Stops a single guild from spamming the bot.
queue_opts.max_rand_tag_cnt: The maximum number of tags to add to a prompt if a user requests prompt randomization.  Does not count towards max_prompt_len.
queue_opts.min_rand_tag_cnt: The minimum number of tags to add to a prompt if a user requests prompt randomization.  Does not count towards max_prompt_len.
queue_opts.rand_dict_path: Path to a newline-separated list of words for tag randomization.  Can be an absolute path or relative to imageGenSD.py.  Must conform to SD requirements (no underscores, escaped parentheses, etc).
queue_opts.tag_retry_limit: How many times to retry getting a unique tag from the tag dictionary before moving on.  Reduces the chances of duplicate tages in a prompt.
